name: Immanuel Baptist Church
description: Multi-site Baptist church providing spiritual guidance, community support, and various ministries including student programs, missions, and family services. Offers worship services, prayer support, and community outreach programs. Welcoming environment for all individuals seeking spiritual guidance and community connection.
source: Verified from official website and Google search results
hours_of_operation: Sunday services at 9:30 AM and 11:00 AM, Wednesday student ministry at 6:30 PM
eligibility_requirements: Open to all individuals seeking spiritual guidance and community support
populations_served: General community, families, students, individuals seeking spiritual support
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://weareibc.com. Phone number (606) 521-4980 confirmed from multiple sources including Google search results and church directory listings. Address 720 Browning Acres Road, Corbin, KY 40701 verified on official website and Google Maps. Website verified current and accessible. Church offers multiple ministries including student programs, missions, and community outreach. Services include Sunday worship at 9:30 AM and 11:00 AM, Wednesday student ministry at 6:30 PM.
